sentences.en: Come on, Josh, you don't expect me to buy what you said just now.
sentences.cn: 行啦, 乔希, 你别指望我会相信你刚才说的话.

sentences.en: Did you hear Josh Friedman got engaged to a chef?
sentences.cn: 你听说乔希·弗莱德曼当上厨师了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Does he know where Phillip is holding Josh?
sentences.cn: 他知道菲力浦把乔什放在哪里 吗 ?

sentences.en: Hi, Josh. I just had coffee with a friend.
sentences.cn: 嗨, 乔希. 我刚和朋友喝完咖啡.

sentences.en: I wouldn't be that hard on him, Josh.
sentences.cn: 我不能那样苛责他, 乔希.

sentences.en: Josh and Sunny see a long line of people outside a store.
sentences.cn: 乔希和珊妮看到一家商店外面排了一条长龙.

sentences.en: Josh expects me to manage all the household expenses on very little.
sentences.cn: 乔希指望我对每笔家庭支出都精打细算。

sentences.en: Josh Habib lay in a dirt field, gasping for air.
sentences.cn: 乔希.哈比躺在脏兮兮的地上, 喘着大气.

sentences.en: Josh has just left the doctor's office when he runs into Meg.
sentences.cn: 乔希刚离开医生办公室,这时碰到了梅格.

sentences.en: Josh has now effectively retired from the world of showbiz.
sentences.cn: 乔希已经事实上退出娱乐圈了.

sentences.en: Josh has this kind of rugged thing going ; he's a guy's guy.
sentences.cn: 他有那种粗犷、朴实的味道,是个 好样 的小伙子.

sentences.en: Josh to help her take care of his younger brother special needs.
sentences.cn: 乔希不得不帮助妈妈照顾残疾的弟弟.

sentences.en: Josh: No, just tell him to tune the guitar properly.
sentences.cn: 乔希: 那倒不必.叫他把吉他调好音就行了.

sentences.en: Josh: What's up, Brendan?'re looking pretty stressed out.
sentences.cn: 贾许: 怎麽啦, 布兰登? 你看起来压力很大.

sentences.en: The guys josh him and call him an egghead.
sentences.cn: 大伙儿取笑他，叫他书呆子。

sentences.en: Ward, Josh Billings , and a host of others have survived only in scattered shards of humour.
sentences.cn: 沃德 、 比林斯和许多别的作家能够留传下来的只是些幽默的残章断简.

trans.tran_en: to talk to someone or laugh at them in a gentle joking way
